This review was made because of how dumb I am. I hated the game at first because I tried running through the game quick. Turns out you need to use your brain and actually listen to the dialogue, (which tells you crucial information and possibly develops the story). The graphics don't hold up amazingly well, but if you have that problem buy Black Mesa. In conclusion, use the frontal lobe and you'll love the game. (also after I uninstalled and reinstalled the game I had different weapons and the already existing weapons had new sprites. I still don't know why this was, but it happened anyway).
мне кажется это одна из самых лучших игр валв потому что это целая легенда игра просто супер прошёл много раз досих пор нравится играть!
I played Half-Life only now. And I can see why this game is so legendary.

Over 20 years old, still worth playing. Most of the chapters keep adding new gimmicks to keep the player entertained, so it's worth a play through if you can handle late 90s graphics. I especially like it for the ending helping paint a clearer picture of Gordon Freeman's history with Black Mesa and G-man when you go in to half-life two off of this.

Going through my backlog to finally play the games i bought but never touched. This is somehow one of them. 

All in all i guess it was a fairly good game. Got some cleverly designed maps and areas and the retro graphics are pretty charming. Might not be as mindblowing in 2020 as it might have been in 1998 but hey, it's the beginning of one of the most hyped sagas in gaming history.  Onwards to HL2 and it's episodes!

Truly a timeless masterpiece that remains and will remain an example of Valve's impact on the gaming industry.

May have been good when it was released, only actually played it recently. controls are wibbly, wobbly, and generally uncomfortable, and I can't find something I like about it. Maybe I'm spoiled with good modern game design, but this doesn't feel good to play, and what I've seen of the story so far is the most cookie-cutter-sci-fi plot I've yet to experience.

Maybe it picks up later, but I can't bring myself to keep playing. Friend recommended "Black Mesa" as an alternative, narratively equivalent stand-in.

I bought this game a couple of months ago and forgot about it for a second. Too bad for me, because when I started playing again, I got so hooked that I played the whole series in 3 weeks! The gameplay is so entertaining that you forget about the graphics immediately. And if they still bother you, go look at it's remake called Black Mesa. Half-Life is truly a game every gamer should have experienced.

Half Life is a classic and a must play game. It's probably one of my most favorite games ever and I highly recommend it. Obviously it's pretty old and there are some frustrating parts of the game but overall It's great all the way through.

这款跨时代的老游戏在我游玩之前，我一直把他束之高阁。因为入手玩的时候实在是觉着hl太古老了，不管是画面表现，玩法，ui还是其他什么的（作为解谜游戏，游戏内引导确实比较少）。当然，在我静下心来，努力摆脱那些短流程，高刺激的“当代游戏玩法”给我带来的影响的时候，我下定决心，要认真认真通关游玩hl（尽管我在初中时就玩过盗版的针锋相对叻，多亏我的基友带路）。在那之后，我才终于领略到这款游戏的奥秘。作为一款1998年的游戏，它在游戏玩法，游戏细节和内容上是开创性的！谁能想到，用超量单张地图，居然能构建出一个无比宏大的世界呢？在游戏刚开始的时候，玩家便能扮演弗里曼博士乘坐旅程无聊冗长且盘根错节的铁路系统前往实验室，直到实验发生事故，黑山基地发生大量爆炸与离奇生物的时候。玩家才意识到，游戏开端的的铁路旅程都是在为接下来的冒险内容做好铺垫——逃离黑山基地。弗里曼博士要在各种外星生物包围下，危险的场景中，以及军队的围剿下逃出生天（当然游戏最后弗里曼博士并没有逃脱，给Gman抓了起来）。游玩后我总是想着，或许半条命并不是错误翻译，正常人类是不可能在这周状况下逃生的罢。我对这款游戏的综合评价就是，半衰期是一款紧张，刺激，令人回味且游戏内容超级丰富（相对于98年的游戏来说）的单机解密游戏。

i suck at bhopping
good

Great atmosphere.... that is the positive. This game has been utterly destroyed by the passage of time, every enemy is a bullet sponge, the platforming is the worst I have ever had to slog through in a video game.... even fans of the game say that the Xen levels "arent as good" as the previous ones when that is the understatement of the century. This game is so frustrating because Ive been told it is a masterpiece for years and to be truthful... I hate this game. All of the xen levels are ugly, vomit inducing I would go as far to say. The sound design is really great, its classic, there is a reason Valve continues to use these sounds in all of their games (other than laziness) and its because they are iconic. Still. this game isnt fun, I am someone that enjoys old games, ive beaten Quake, DOOM, DOOM 2, DOOM 64 but this game is just an absolute slog from start to finish, none of the guns do any damage, the entire game looks absolutely terrible visually and not just because its old but because everything blends in with each other. This game might have been good in 1998 but again, it doesnt hold up well at ALL where as the original doom game felt great with enemies having exactly as much health as they should along with guns feeling like they have an actual impact because of the amazing sound design and bullets making indents on enemies upon impact so you can see that they are connecting. This is not a review saying "doom good half life bad" this is just an example of how poor I think Half Lifes gunplay is. I dont know what else to say that I havent said already, horrible platforming, weak guns, bullet sponge enemies, ugly environments. The environmental story telling is great along with the atmosphere but the actual gameplay is so bad I do not recommend this game. 

EDIT: Forgot to mention the constant stuttering, crashing and destruction of save files! (I had to replay the last three levels after I crashed!!!!!!!!!)

Joyita, uno de esos juegos obligados a jugar en tu vida como "gamer". Sus virtudes son innumerables, pero en su legado recae la importancia de Half-Life. La narrativa en shooters no la creó HL, sin embargo tomó real importancia a partir de este titulo. Es un juego que aún hoy puedes disfrutar aunque no haya envejecido del todo bien en ciertos aspectos (Bugs, Físicas, Gameplay etc.) pero nada es terrible como para opacar sus puntos fuertes.  Yo, una persona que nació en la década de los 2000 se apreciar la obra como un clásico pero más que eso, un buen juego. Uno divertido, interesante y que me ha abierto al mundo de los shooters lineales. En fin, un MustPlay de Steam y un clásico que nunca se olvidará,

PD: Valve saca Half-Life 3 no seas mamón.

- Recensione -

Half-Life è un FPS molto semplice di gameplay e molto apprezzato dall'utenza media. Questo gioco L'ho scaricato e finito nell'arco di tre giorni, non giocandoci nemmeno tanto. Devo dire che da tutte le voci che giravano mi aspettavo molto di più. Il gioco presenta molti difetti tecnici: Glitch grafici, Audio pessimo per la prima metà del gioco (soprattutto nei "dialoghi"). Quando si utilizza una valvola/leva/pulsante c'era la possibilità di bloccarsi sul posto e toccava ricaricare il salvataggio. I movimenti sono scivolosi e fatti male (infatti spesso succedeva che scivolavo su un poligono e cadevo di sotto). Insomma un sacco di roba, ma il gameplay non è terribile, anzi, potrei dire che è l'unico elemento che si salva. Sono molto deluso e mi aspettavo MOLTO di più. 

Voto: 5/10. 

"Sopravvalutato"

P.S non sto valutando il gioco per l'età ma per come è stato sviluppato, quindi niente commenti del tipo "eh, ma è vecchio", grazie.

yes

Half-Life jest jednym z cudów wśród gier wideo wszech czasów. Za czasów powstania gry była formą całkowicie trójwymiarowego DOOM'a. Jednak gra cieszy się świetną fabułą, którą i tak nie trzeba rozumieć, trzymającymi w napięciu momentami, rozbudowaną siecią korytarzy(oprócz zwykłych sal także są szyby wentylacyjne), różnorodne sekrety pomagające w przejściu gry, nietypowe zagadki(np. przejście do innej sali za pomocą rozwalenia szyby) no i oczywiście dużo frajdy z zabijania stworów i wyzwania w walce z elitą Black Mesy. Osobiście polecam dzisiaj zagrać w to i poznać początek walki Gordona Freemana z wyłażącymi z portalu kosmitami i odkrycia prawdy o korporacji. Rzecz jasna dzisiaj można po części porównać Half-Life'a do znanego serialu Stranger Things.

I can clearly see how the game is enjoyable, but I tried it on Hard and it's generally just unfun to play at that difficulty. I finished it, but compared to other Half-Life games, it's just boring. Most enemies are 0 threat, but the soldiers on hard kill you in about 5 shots, and when you eventually have to fight groups semi-often the game just starts feeling like it's not the legend it is. I'd definetly reccomend it, but just don't play on hard and have a good time playing such a classic.
